message: Starting research on psychology quiz explanation best practices. First examining existing quiz structure in week files.
Analyzed 3 week files showing detailed explanation structure. Now researching educational psychology best practices for quiz explanations.
Researched educational psychology principles. Now searching for specific guidance on tone and language level for PSYC 100 students.
Synthesizing comprehensive pedagogy guidelines based on educational psychology research and existing quiz patterns.

COMPLETED: Comprehensive pedagogy guidelines delivered. Research findings: (1) Elaborative feedback (WHY not just WHAT) enhances learning transfer and deeper understanding; (2) Explanations should explicitly reference course content (researchers, theories, studies) to link with prior knowledge; (3) Tone should be academic but accessible for university freshmen; (4) Quality standards established based on analysis of 50+ existing explanations across weeks 1-3. Full guidelines documented in findings with examples, cognitive psychology principles, and quality checklist.
